"时光之恋" (Time's Romance) - A dish that captures the essence of nostalgia
"秘密花园" (Secret Garden) - A dish that unlocks the secrets of the senses
"梦境之旅" (Dream Journey) - A dish that takes you on a fantastical adventure
"风之歌" (Song of the Wind) - A dish that captures the essence of freedom and movement
"夜空之夜" (Night Sky) - A dish that takes you on a celestial journey
